org.apache.commons.math4.fitting.leastsquares

Class AbstractLeastSquaresOptimizerAbstractTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math4.fitting.leastsquares.AbstractLeastSquaresOptimizerAbstractTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaussNewtonOptimizerWithCholeskyTest, GaussNewtonOptimizerWithLUTest, GaussNewtonOptimizerWithQRTest, GaussNewtonOptimizerWithSVDTest, LevenbergMarquardtOptimizerTest

    public abstract class AbstractLeastSquaresOptimizerAbstractTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Some of the unit tests are re-implementations of the MINPACK file17 and file22 test files. The redistribution policy for MINPACK is available here.

    Concrete implementation of an optimizer.
